sentences.en: A walker fell 80ft from a rocky pinnacle.
sentences.cn: 一位徒步者从一块80英尺高的尖锥形岩石上摔了下来。

sentences.en: Madeleine placed it carefully in the rocky niche.
sentences.cn: 玛德琳小心翼翼地把它放在岩石壁龛里.

sentences.en: No man has ever set foot on that rocky island; it's impossible to land there.
sentences.cn: 没人涉足那个岩岛, 不可能在那儿上岸.

sentences.en: The brook warbled over its rocky bed.
sentences.cn: 小溪潺潺流过多石的河床.

sentences.en: The foaming waves chafe against the rocky shore.
sentences.cn: 汹涌的波涛猛烈地冲击着礁岸.

sentences.en: The paths are often very rocky so strong boots are advisable.
sentences.cn: 路上通常石头很多，所以最好穿结实耐磨的靴子。

sentences.en: The peasant labourers really [actually] hewed a tunnel through that rocky mountain.
sentences.cn: 民工们硬是打通了这座大山，修成了隧道。

sentences.en: The rhino broke away and ran not at us, but along the rocky bank beside us.
sentences.cn: 这头犀牛突然跑开了,但它没冲着我们跑来, 而是沿着我们旁边的石堤跑了.

sentences.en: The Rocky Mountains have rugged mountains and roads.
sentences.cn: 落基山脉有崇山峻岭和崎岖不平的道路.

sentences.en: The surrounding countryside is windswept and rocky.
sentences.cn: 这周围的乡村风多石头多。

sentences.en: Their relationship had gotten off to a rocky start.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系在磕磕绊绊中开始了。

sentences.en: They had gone through some rocky times together when Ann was first married.
sentences.cn: 当安刚结婚时，他们已经一起度过了一些艰难时光。

sentences.en: They hurried over the rough rocky ground .
sentences.cn: 他们匆匆穿过那崎岖不平的石头地。

sentences.en: This chair is a trifle rocky.
We looked up at the rocky peaks towering above us.
sentences.cn: 我们抬头观望高高耸立的遍布岩石的山峰.

words.tran_cn: 石头般的；坚硬如岩石的
摇杆；摇的人；镰刀弯；套钩；摇轴
生在海岸岩石上的海草
岩石的，多岩石的；坚如岩石的；摇晃的；头晕目眩的

trans.tran_cn: 多岩石的，坚如磐石的，坚硬的，麻木的，头晕目眩的，艰难的，难以维持的；不稳定的
trans.tran_en: covered with rocks or made of rock
